prompts: Create a cute, round Pokemon that loves to help others and has soft, fluffy features.
Make a pink, chubby creature that is known for its healing abilities and gentle nature.
Imagine a Pokemon with a unique egg-shaped body that brings joy to children in the forest.
Show me a friendly creature that has a calming presence and can heal its friends in battle.
Generate a Pokemon that has a cheerful expression, rosy accents, and a nurturing personality.
Design a lovable creature with large eyes and a pouch, perfect for carrying eggs and treats.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies comfort and care, often found in peaceful grassy areas.
